name: Super Bob Adventure Banana Country
description: Exciting gameplay with excellent gameplay. Where you can venture, with the legendary monkeys of the "BOB" clan. Run, jump, climb obstacles and avoid the enemies that will be everywhere to obscure your way. For their courage, the inhabitants of the jungle, desert, water world and the underworld called it "Super BOB." You have to go the hard way. On your way you will encounter different obstacles, enemies and other creatures that not even the bravest dares to challenge. Following your way through the jungle, through the hot desert, through the dark and gloomy underworld - You have to reach your ascent. Also do not forget to collect fruit and other gifts on your way. All this will help you reach the goal and protect your name among the "Super BOB."
